name: Learn Python: The Complete Python Programming Course
sub_title: Learn A-Z everything about Python, from the basics, to advanced topics like Python GUI, Python Data Analysis, and more!

description.des_title: If you’re looking to learn Python for the very first time or need a quick brush-up, this is the course for you!
description.content: Python has rapidly become one of the most popular programming languages around the world. Compared to other languages such as Java or C++, Python consistently outranks and outperforms these languages in demand from businesses and job availability. The average Python developer makes over $100,000 - this number is only going to grow in the coming years.
learning_point: How to download and install python

name: React - The Complete Guide (incl Hooks, React Router, Redux)
sub_title: Dive in and learn React.js from scratch! Learn Reactjs, Hooks, Redux, React Routing, Animations, Next.js and way more!

description.des_title: This course is fully up-to-date with React 18 (the latest version of React)! It was completely updated and re-recorded from the ground up - it teaches the very latest version of React with all the core, modern features you need to know!
description.content: This course also comes with two paths which you can take: The complete path (full >40h course) and the summary path (~4h summary module) - you can choose the path that best fits your time requirements! React.js is THE most popular JavaScript library you can use and learn these days to build modern, reactive user interfaces for the web.
Requirements: JavaScript + HTML + CSS fundamentals are absolutely required
You DON'T need to be a JavaScript expert to succeed in this course!
ES6+ JavaScript knowledge is beneficial but not a must-have
NO prior React or any other JS framework experience is required!
learning_point: A thorough introduction to React.js (What is it and why would you use it?)
All the core basics: How React works, building components with React & building UIs with React
Working with user events and state to create interactive applications

name: API Testing with Python 3 & PyTest, Backend Automation 2022
sub_title: Learn to build framework for API automation testing (backend testing) using Python and PyTest, SQL, Reports, Docke

description.des_title: Learn how to use Python to test the back-end of web services or APIs. We use industry standard real eCommerce RESTful API to practice testing using Python programming language.
description.content: We will build a framework using one of the most popular testing tools PyTest. The framework we will build will be extendable and scalable to be able to include frontend (Selenium WebDriver) testing.The skills learned here are used in any Web Serivces testing.
Requirements: Have basic knowledge of Python programming language
Have basic knowledge of software testing
Have sudo/admin access to your laptop to be able to install software
learning_point: Plenty of APIs (endpoints) for you to practice with beyond this class
Enough material and examples to be able to create a      project and maintain a GitHub repo
Industry standard tools to add to your resume.

name: Beginning C++ Programming - From Beginner to Beyond
sub_title: Obtain Modern C++ Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) and STL skills. C++14 and C++17 covered. C++20 info see below.

description.des_title: Which programming language is often seen as a badge of honor among software developers?  C++
description.content: Which programming language is routinely ranked in the top 5 programming languages by popularity, and been consistently in the top 10 for close to 20 years?  C++ Why you should learn C++ Much, if not most of the software written today is still written in C++ and this has been the case for many, many years.
Requirements: Access to a computer running Windows, Mac OS X or Linux
learning_point: Looping with while, do/while for, range-based for statements and recursion
Using existing classes and creating objects
An introduction to the C++ STL

name: Blockchain Programming
sub_title: Build a blockchain and cryptocurrency from scratch using Python

description.des_title: You'll learn the ins and outs of blockchain like only a blockchain programmer knows. Using only a few Python libraries, we'll build a cryptocurrency from the ground up. Even if you have very little programming experience we can help you through it!
description.content: You'll learn about digital signatures, hashing and proof-of-work mining. We'll design and build a scheme for decentralized consensus including communicating over TCP/IP sockets. Bring your basic knowledge of Python, and you'll emerge on the other side with a grasp of cryptocurrencies better than 99% of your peers and with a working prototype you can build on.
Requirements: Beginning knowledge of any programming language

name: Machine Learning A-Z™: Hands-On Python & R In Data Science
sub_title: Learn NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Scikit-learn, Scipy and develop Machine Learning Models in Python

description.des_title: Are you interested in data science and machine learning, but you don't have any background, and you find the concepts confusing?
description.content: Are you interested in programming in Python, but you always afraid of coding? I think this course is for you! Even if you are familiar with machine learning, this course can help you to review all the techniques and understand the concept behind each term.
learning_point: Chapter1: Introduction and all required installations
Chapter2: Useful Machine Learning libraries (NumPy, Pandas & Matplotlib)

name: The Complete JavaScript Course 2022: From Zero to Expert!
Build Responsive Real-World Websites with HTML and CSS
Flutter & Dart - The Complete Guide [2022 Edition]
